channel.title: CVE Feed for MicroDicom -- DICOM Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MicroDicom -- DICOM Viewer

item.title: CVE-2024-22100|2024-03-01T00:41:25.917Z -- MicroDicom -- DICOM Viewer
item.description: MicroDicom DICOM Viewer versions 2023.3 (Build 9342) and prior are affected by a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of DICOM Viewer. A user must open a malicious DCM file in order to exploit the vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-25578|2024-03-01T00:40:00.677Z -- MicroDicom -- DICOM Viewer
item.description: MicroDicom DICOM Viewer versions 2023.3 (Build 9342) and prior contain a lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which could result in memory corruption within the application.
